answers.answer: Sometimes face swelling can be a sign of preeclampsia I don't think I spelled that right. Be careful make sure that you don't have it. Maybe to much salt in your diet or not enough water possibly
Well it just started about a week ago, I'm 39w&6d and they've tested me for that b4 and said I didn't maybe I'm just eating to much salt like u said..

Swelling is no fun... I have to lay with my feet up and right before I get out of bed put my socks on and hurry up and put my largest pair of sneakers on... otherwise I wear slippers everywhere. Lol I'm 39+4

question: Ugh! My feet have literally swollen 2 sizes :( I'm having to wear finances tennishoes right now or flip flops, but flip flops just seem to hurt my feet more.and my hands are swollen to so bad I can't squeeze :( even my face grr.. is this normal ? title: Swelling ??
